price: Ni ho rero Adamu na Hawa bafungura kuri nya giti babuzwa n’Imana Allah kugifungurako, ubwambure bwabo buca buragaragara, babona bambaye ubusa, baca batangura gukorora amababi y’ibiti vyo mu Bwami bw’ijuru ngo bapfuke ubwambure bwabo bugaragara, Adamu aba aciye kubiri n’ibwirizwa yahawe n’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah, maze arahuba.
arabic: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ

meta.transliteration: fa-akalā min'hā fabadat lahumā sawātuhumā waṭafiqā yakhṣifāni ʿalayhimā min waraqi al-janati waʿaṣā ādamu rabbahu faghawā
